confidence.notes: Confidence reduced by mixed source quality and bearish technical regime despite strong cash generation.

thesis: Salesforce is a high-quality, cash-generative software platform with improved margins and solid FCF, trading below premium software peers on several multiples. Upside depends on sustaining mid/high-single-digit growth and translating AI product momentum into durable monetization while protecting margins.
risk_flags: Multiple compression in risk-off or higher-rate environments
Competitive pressure from platform vendors (notably Microsoft)
Technical trend remains bearish below 50DMA and 200DMA
